answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Mary, 
Thank you for your question and I am sorry for the delay in response while we have been working to resolve this issue. One of the members of the Knowledge Network Team from the Alliance for Innovation is working on this issue and the webinar should be added shortly. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Mary Hunt
text:
Is there any chance the Next Door webinar will be added to the On-Demand menu of webinars. We viewed it this past summer and would like to share with others in our community.
Thanks!
Mary M. Hunt
Senior Planner
City of Independence, MO
title: Next Door webinar
